copySelectPromptInstructions.message: Choose the content you wish to copy from the select menu

textAndValue.message: Text and value placed in parentheses (if different)

accessFormControls_description.message: Allow access by right-click to form controls text context (e.g., buttons, select menus, etc.)

accessPass_description.message: Allow access by right-click to password fields

showAltText_description.message: Copy alt attribute content in addition to displayed link text (probably best to keep disabled)

immediateFormClickExecution_title.message: Immediate execution of a form click

immediateFormClickExecution_description.message: When right-clicking buttons, select menus, non-text input boxes, or images, grab textual information pertaining to the form element (may interfere with Firefox context menu or web applications using the context menu--safest to keep disabled)

copyLinkTextAccessKey_title.message: Access key for copying link text

copyLinkTextAccessKey_description.message: A single letter (within the phrase "Copy Link Text") to be used as an accesskey for fast keyboard access after opening the context menu. Leave blank for the default.
